import React, { useState } from "react"; import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; import Footer from "components/Footers/Footer"; import Navbar from "components/Navbars/AuthNavbar.js"; const Tournament = () => { const [tournamentData, setTournamentData] = useState({ name: "", date: "", teams: "", location: "", description: "", }); const history = useHistory(); const handleChange = (e) => { setTournamentData({ ...tournamentData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value, }); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); alert("Tournoi créé avec succès !"); console.log(tournamentData); // Redirection vers page liste tournois history.push("/mytournaments"); }; return ( <>
